name: Escape It! (Realinspirer) (Realinspirer)
description:
A point and click game, with a story that has just started, and hopefully will be continued!

Play the WebGL version (play in browser) - https://html5.gamedistribution.com/1b64799f55b6445c8deb6d901a8f292c/

WebGL may not provide good performance, that's why I uploaded this game as a PC standalone, but you can support me via WebGL (ads and whatever). I cannot set up donations on itch.io at this moment, but soon!

Thanks for playing!

Made with ❤️ by Realinspirer!
